job_purpose: Drive strategic business development initiatives for data and AI solutions across the Australia and New Zealand region, positioning SLB as the preferred partner for digital transformation in the energy sector.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Lead identification and capture of new market opportunities for data and AI solutions
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to formulate innovative technology and service offerings
Develop comprehensive solution proposals combining advanced AI/ML capabilities with domain expertise
Collect and analyze market intelligence, competitor information, and market size data
Contribute to product development roadmap based on market feedback and customer requirements
Serve as a technical advisor to internal and external stakeholders, providing guidance based on domain knowledge
required_qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Petroleum Engineering, or related technical discipline
Minimum 8-10 years of experience in technical sales, business development, or solution architecture within the energy sector
Proven track record in data solution architecture with understanding of backend/frontend development and cloud technologies
Demonstrated success in achieving revenue targets and winning new business opportunities
Strong familiarity with oil and gas domain, including E&P data management practices
Experience with cloud computing platforms (AWS, Google Cloud) and data analytics tools (SQL, visualization)
Understanding of AI/ML technologies and their application in industrial settings
Familiarity with SLB applications including ProSource, Studio, Lumi, and Delfi platform
Excellent communication skills with ability to convey complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
Proven ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional teams and build relationships at all organizational levels
Experience in conducting workshops, technical presentations, and customer demonstrations
company_details: Global technology company driving energy innovation for a balanced planet. Inclusive culture focused on collaboration and success. Hiring talented individuals to support personal and professional growth.
